text: Fred Clarke (1 December 1932 â€“ 17 August 2020) was an Australian rules footballer. He played with Richmond in the Victorian Football League (VFL). During his career he wore the number 17 guernsey. In the 1953 season, Clarke played four early games before suffering a thigh injury from which he was unable to recover well enough to make any more appearances. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Sportspeople from Victoria (Australia)
title: Fred Clarke (Australian footballer)
